description:
Transport a featherweight road bike or a snow-stomping fatbike. This rack can be folded upright. Or tilted away from the car for trunk access when your bikes are loaded. The Lockable AutoAttach system ensures the rack is tight and stable, and 2 integrated cable locks secure bikes to the rack. And the design ensures your frame won't get scratched in transit.

  • Integrated wheels make it easy to transport
  • Fits bikes with wheels between 20 and 29in
  • Compatible with tires up to 5in. wide
  • Space between bikes allows use with multiple bike with Boost spacing and fatbikes
  • Tool-free installation and removal with Thule® AutoAttach system
  • Folds when not in use, tilts for rear access when loaded
  • Bikes locks to rack, rack locks to vehicle
  • Contact-free attachment ensure no scratches to your bike
  • Bike side-to-side adjustment ensures maximum clearance
  • Max load is 27kg per tray, 54kg total
name: Thule T2 Pro XTR 2-Bike Hitch Mount Rack -1 1/4in. Receiver
